entry.title: Current Conditions: -2.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Portage Southport Airport 5:00 PM CST Saturday 18 February 2023
Temperature: -2.5°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.7 kPa falling
Humidity: 82 %
Wind Chill: -7
Dewpoint: -5.2°C
Wind: ENE 11 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday night: Snow. Low minus 20.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Snow beginning early this evening. Blowing snow at times overnight. Amount 2 cm. Wind becoming north 40 km/h gusting to 60 near midnight. Low minus 20. Wind chill minus 7 this evening and minus 34 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Saturday 18 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 16.
entry.summary: Clearing in the morning. Blowing snow at times in the morning. Wind north 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 in the morning then becoming light in the afternoon. High minus 16. Wind chill minus 34 in the morning and minus 22 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Saturday 18 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Light snow. Low minus 18.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Light snow beginning in the evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 18. Wind chill minus 22 in the evening and minus 27 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Saturday 18 February 2023
